change_email_form.title: Change email
change_email_form.success_message: Your email change has been received. Check your new email to complete the change.

do_not_email.title: Do not email me

status.no_emails_enabled_message: Emails are currently <1>disabled</1> for your account.
status.no_emails_disabled_message: Emails are currently <1>enabled</1> for your account.

do_not_email.caveat: By enabling this setting, your account will be set to not accept host requests. You will still receive security emails (such as those for resetting your password). You may still receive the newsletter, you can unsubscribe from it using the link in the newsletter footer.

change_email_confirmation.success_message: Your email has been changed successfully!

change_password_form.title: Change password
change_password_form.subtitle: Use this form to reset your login password.
change_password_form.password_changed_success: Your new password has been set and a notification was sent to your email.
change_password_form.user_logged_error: You cannot reset your password if you are logged in. You can change your password in settings or log out to reset it.
change_password_form.token_error: There was a error processing the password reset token, please try opening the link from the email again.
change_password_form.reset_password_success: Your password has been changed successfully!

jail_set_password_form.title: Set a password
jail_set_password_form.explanation: You have not previously set a password for your account. Please create one now to continue.

reset_password_form.success_message: Check your email for a reset password link!

form.no_password_login_prompt: Check your email for a link to log in! :)

basic_sign_up_form.sign_up_agreement_explainer: By continuing, you agree to our <2>Terms of Service</2>, including our cookie, email, and data handling policies.

username.validation_error: Username can only have numbers or _, and should start with a letter.

password.validation_error: Password must be between 8 and 256 characters and not be extremely common.

birthday.validation_error: Must be a valid date in the past.
birthday.too_young_error: You must be at least 18 years old to use Couchers

account_form.opt_in_newsletter: Subscribe to our occasional newsletter about community updates.
account_form.tos_prompt: To continue, please read and accept the <1></1>.
account_form.tos_accept_label: I Accept the Terms of Service.

email.empty_error: Please enter a valid email address

jail.title: More information required
jail.description: Please check the following in order to continue.

terms_of_service_section.description: We've updated our Terms of Service. To continue, please read and accept the new <1></1>.

mod_note_section.title: You have received a note from the moderators
mod_note_section.description: The moderators have sent you the following note. Please read it carefully and acknowledge that you have read and understood it before continuing.

activeness_probe.title: Are you still open to hosting surfers?
activeness_probe.description: We noticed you haven't logged in for a while and wanted to check if you're still open to hosting surfers.
activeness_probe.not_hosting: I'm no longer able to host.
activeness_probe.note: We'll updated your profile to match this choice!

sign_up_resend_verification_email_help: Didn't receive the email? Click <2>here to resend the verification link</2>.
sign_up_resend_verification_done: Done! We've sent you another email.
sign_up_completed_prompt: We have sent an email with a verification link to your email address. Please click the link to activate your account.
sign_up_confirmed_prompt: You're all done! If you are not redirected, try logging in.

gender_section.title: Change gender
gender_section.explanation: Admins will be happy to change your gender label. Please contact support@couchers.org!

birth_date_section.title: Change birthdate
birth_date_section.explanation: Admins will be happy to change your birthdate. Please contact support@couchers.org!

timezone_section.title: Timezone and localisation
timezone_section.description: Your timezone is <1>{{timezone}}</1>. Based on this, your local time is approximately <4>{{time}}</4>.
timezone_section.explanation: This time and timezone is determined based on your home location. Please report a bug if it is incorrect.

username_section.title: Username
username_section.explanation: Your username is set when you create your account.

feature_preview.title: Feature Preview
feature_preview.explanation: This page allows you to try out features that are still in development before they are quite ready for use by everyone.
feature_preview.disclaimer: Please keep in mind that these features are experimental. They may not work as intended and they may change rapidly as we develop them. Feel free to give feedback using the "Report a problem" button to report any bugs!

no_previews.title: No features currently in preview
no_previews.explanation: There are currently no active features in preview, please check back later!

active_logins.heading: Current logins
active_logins.settings_page_text: See where you are logged in and log out of other sessions
active_logins.description: This page lists active logins, you can log out of any of them by clicking on the button next to the login, or scrolling to the bottom and clicking the button to log out of all but this session.
active_logins.log_out_of_all_session: Log out of all other sessions

strong_verification.title: Strong Verification
strong_verification.subtitle: Strong Verification is an additional safety feature that allows you to verify your date of birth and gender using your biometric passport.

status.enabled_message: You <1>are currently</1> verified with Strong Verification.
status.disabled_message: You <1>are not currently</1> verified with Strong Verification.

strong_verification.begin_button: Complete Strong Verification with Iris ID
strong_verification.information_text1: You will need a biometric passport (other types of identification will not work) and an NFC-capable Apple iPhone or Android phone.
strong_verification.information_text2: By clicking the button below, you will be taken to the Iris ID website to complete the passport verification process.
strong_verification.information_text3: You can read more about how we and Iris ID process and store your data in our <2>Terms of Service</2>. As per the Iris ID <5>Privacy policy</5>, they will delete your personal information within 24 hours. You can request that this Strong Verification data (except issuing country, expiry date, and the last three digits of the document number) be deleted from our servers at any time with the click of a button.
strong_verification.complete_title: We are processing your Strong Verification attempt
strong_verification.complete_message1: Your passport is being validated. You will receive an email with the results within a few minutes.
strong_verification.complete_message2: Strong Verification expires when your passport expires, and you will need to complete verification again on the new passport.
strong_verification.delete_data_title: Delete your Strong Verification passport data
strong_verification.delete_information: You can delete your Strong Verification data (except issuing country, expiry date, and the last three digits of the document number) from our servers at any time.
strong_verification.delete_information_text2: If you delete your data, you cannot use the same passport for Strong Verification again.
strong_verification.delete_success: Your passport data has been deleted.

change_phone.title: Phone number
change_phone.need_to_donate: You need to <2>donate</2> before you can complete phone verification.
change_phone.no_phone_description: You have not added a phone number to your account. To add one, enter it below. We will verify it with a text message.
change_phone.phone_not_verified_description: We sent you a code to <2>{{phone}}</2>. To verify your number, please enter the code below:
change_phone.remove_phone_description: Your phone number is currently <2>{{phone}}</2>. You can remove your phone number below.
change_phone.change_to_different_description: To change your phone number to a different one, please enter it below.

request.title: Delete account
request.description: To delete your account, please follow the steps below. We will email you a confirmation.
request.confirm_username_explanation: Your username is <1>{{ username }}</1>, please type it in below to confirm account deletion.
request.reason_explanation: Please help us improve the platform by telling us why you've chosen to delete your account.
request.success_message: Account deletion initiated. To complete account deletion, please confirm through the email we sent you.

confirm.title: Confirm account deletion
confirm.account_deleted: Account deleted. Thank you for using Couchers.org!

recover.title: Recover your Couchers.org account
recover.success: Your account has been recovered, you can log back in. We're excited to have you back!
